EmailTemplate.name: A330/A340 Brake Removal
EmailTemplate.subject: A330/A340 Brake Removal Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Service Request for a Key Customer operating A330/A340 Aircraft has been opened, and contains important Brake wear data information. The main objective is to ensure forward notice of impending brake removal, to enable clarity on spare heat sink allocation needs. If further information is required, please contact the Service Request Creator.
Click on the below link to view details: {!Service_Request__c.Link}
